ðŸ“– Summary: wtffmpeg is a command-line tool that leverages a local Large Language Model (LLM) to translate plain English descriptions into ffmpeg commands. It allows users to describe video and audio tasks in natural language and then generates the corresponding ffmpeg command, offering an interactive execution option and GPU acceleration for faster performance.
